com.xhive.security
Interface XhiveNameHandlerIf

All Known Implementing Classes:
XhiveNameHandler
public interface XhiveNameHandlerIf

An interface that maps instances of javax.security.auth.Subject to X-Hive/DB user names and (optionally) group names.

(c) X-Hive Corporation B.V. (www.x-hive.com)

Method Summary
 java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getGroupNames(javax.security.auth.Subject subject)
          From a subject that was successfully authenticated using the Java Authentication and Authorization Service, retrieve the group names to be used in X-Hive/DB.
 java.lang.String getUserName(javax.security.auth.Subject subject)
          From a subject that was successfully authenticated using the Java Authentication and Authorization Service, retrieve the user name to be used in X-Hive/DB.
 

Method Detail

getUserName

java.lang.String getUserName(javax.security.auth.Subject subject)
From a subject that was successfully authenticated using the Java Authentication and Authorization Service, retrieve the user name to be used in X-Hive/DB.

getGroupNames

java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getGroupNames(javax.security.auth.Subject subject)
From a subject that was successfully authenticated using the Java Authentication and Authorization Service, retrieve the group names to be used in X-Hive/DB.

Returns:
A java.util.Set containing java.lang.String objects with the names of the groups that this subject belongs to. Instead of an empty set, null can be returned as well.
